title: Task 19

question.text: How does Alice express her desire to collaborate with the team?

answers.answer: She wants to work alone on her projects.
answers.feedback: Reflect on how working alone contrasts with the idea of collaboration.

answers.answer: She prefers not to contribute to the team's projects.
answers.feedback: Consider what it means to contribute to a team, and how this contrasts with not wanting to contribute.

answers.answer: She wants to collaborate and contribute to projects.
She wants to keep her skills a secret.
answers.feedback: Think about how sharing skills and knowledge relates to the concepts of collaboration and contribution.

dialogue.text: I really want to collaborate with you and to contribute to our projects here at the company.

description: Listen to the audio and answer the question.
